name.help: Name of the recipe to create

openfor.help: Tag to open the memcached firewall for, if environment is passed it will open for the whole environment

databag.help: The name of the data bag to load the mysql credentials from, not used for slaves

database.help: The name of the database to create

user.help: The user with permissions to the database, defaults to the db name

password.help: The password for the user, ignored if databag is set
